testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify available products on inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.050s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.062s Then Verify user should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.025s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify sorting of products by different options -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Verify sorting of products by different options -- @1.1 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.070s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.062s When The user sort products by 'az' ... passed in 2.449s Then Verify the products should be sorted by 'name ascending' order ... passed in 0.008s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify logout from inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.004s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When User logs out from the application ... passed in 2.404s Then Verify user should be redirected to the login page ... passed in 0.006s
